channel.title: News on NewsStreet | News portal
channel.description: Recent content in News on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: How a new update might just save Polygon’s declining dApp activity
item.description: How a new update might just save Polygon’s declining dApp activity Polygon’s MATIC is now ranked 11th in terms of market cap, with the altcoin having garnered a lot of interest due to its increasing number of collaborations.

item.title: Google and Coinbase join forces for the future of Web3
item.description: Google and Coinbase join forces for the future of Web3 Cryptocurrency as a means of decentralized money may be volatile and uncertain but building the future of the web on decentralized blockchain technologies is an explosively emerging market and many tech giants are jumping into the Web3 arena feet first.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy M23 5G, Galaxy A04, Galaxy A04e to launch in India soon as support pages go live
item.description: Samsung Galaxy M23 5G, Galaxy A04, Galaxy A04e to launch in India soon as support pages go live Samsung is gearing to launch a bunch of new M-series and A-series smartphones in India.

item.title: Byju’s allegedly shuts Kerala office, forces employees to resign
item.description: Byju’s allegedly shuts Kerala office, forces employees to resign Byju’s, the world’s most valued edtech firm backed by Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, may have shut its office in Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala and asked employees working there to resign.

item.title: One UI 5.0 update roll out scheduled released for a host of Samsung devices
item.description: One UI 5.0 update roll out scheduled released for a host of Samsung devices Samsung has announced the One UI 5.

item.title: SpaceX usurps Boeing to become NASA’s largest for-profit vendor
item.description: SpaceX usurps Boeing to become NASA’s largest for-profit vendor Fourteen years after winning its first major NASA contract, data shared by Aviation Week reporter Irene Klotz shows that SpaceX has usurped every other major aerospace company in the US to become the space agency’s largest for-profit vendor.

item.title: Motorola Moto Razr 2022 flip phone arrives in Europe, India launch likely
item.description: Motorola Moto Razr 2022 flip phone arrives in Europe, India launch likely Motorola has announced the international release of its next-generation flagship foldable smartphone Moto Razr 2022, which comes with Qualcomms’ latest chipset, Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1.

item.title: Redmi Note 12 Pro+ 5G camera specifications confirmed ahead of launch
item.description: Redmi Note 12 Pro+ 5G camera specifications confirmed ahead of launch Redmi Note 12 series is arriving on October 27 and the brand is building hype around it before the launch.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Series gets Android 13-based One UI 5 update: Check its top features here
item.description: Samsung Galaxy S22 Series gets Android 13-based One UI 5 update: Check its top features here Samsung has finally started rolling out Android 13-based One UI 5 update to its Galaxy S22 series smartphones.

item.title: What of Bitcoin [BTC] when things start getting ‘difficult’
item.description: What of Bitcoin [BTC] when things start getting ‘difficult’ Bitcoin mining has been subject to a lot of controversies of late.

item.title: Can Reddit NFTs’ launch have a positive impact on Polygon’s growth?
item.description: Can Reddit NFTs’ launch have a positive impact on Polygon’s growth?

item.title: Why you should read this before going all in on Tron [TRX]
item.description: Why you should read this before going all in on Tron [TRX] Tron [TRX], the cryptocurrency currently ranked 14th in terms of market cap, was in the news recently for its collaboration with the Dominican government.

item.title: EOS’s presence around this liquidity pocket will keep these parties interested
item.description: EOS’s presence around this liquidity pocket will keep these parties interested Disclaimer: The information presented does not constitute financial, investment, trading, or other types of advice and is solely the writer’s opinion.

item.title: Texas Governor celebrates Diwali with Indian-Americans
item.description: Texas Governor celebrates Diwali with Indian-Americans The couple was dressed in ethnic Indian attire as they welcomed guests, and also lit the traditional lamp to mark the festival.

item.title: Elon Musk visits Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico & chats with officials
item.description: Elon Musk visits Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico & chats with officials Tesla CEO Elon Musk took a trip to Nuevo León, Mexico, this weekend, where he was spotted talking with a state official and the wife of Governor Samuel García Sepulveda, Mariana Rodríguez.

item.title: Flipkart Big Diwali Sale: Ordered gaming laptop from Flipkart received a giant stone and e-waste
item.description: Flipkart Big Diwali Sale: Ordered gaming laptop from Flipkart received a giant stone and e-waste Chinmaya Ramana of Mangalore, Karnataka ordered a gaming laptop on Flipkart in the Big Diwali Sale.

item.title: Gujarat BJP targets Kejriwal over cracker ban in Delhi
item.description: Gujarat BJP targets Kejriwal over cracker ban in Delhi Rajkot: Gujarat BJP chief C R Paatil has hit out at Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal over his government’s decision to completely ban firecrackers in the national capital, and dubbed such people “anti-religious” who were stopping citizens from celebrating their festivals.
